name: Arsenal - The Professor of Science 17
description:
Please note prints will be delivered after 1 January 2014 

The ‘Professor of Science’ is visual tribute to Arsene Wenger showing every player to represent Arsenal football club in his 17 full seasons at the club. Appearance and goal information is included for each player. One of the prints is displayed at the Arsenal’s training ground.

Each image is a high quality giclée print, on a luxurious heavy weight Hahnemühle fine art paper. The print size of the image is 30*40cm or 40*50cm.

A Limited Edition of 80 standard prints will be made of Wenger 16. Each print is signed and dated by the artist.

Prints can be personalised to include the name of your choice in an additional cell. Please email us BEFORE you order to confirm the first name initial, a surname  and two numbers that you wish to include in your cell (e.g. bS, Smith, 99, 45). Otherwise the lovely standard print will be sent for your pleasure.

Prints will be sent in a strong postal tube. As each print is made individually, we aim to deliver within 5 working days. We can deliver throughout Europe, the USA and other wonderful parts of the world. Please note that the print is unframed. And as each image is individually printed, every print is unique.

name: Tour de France - 'le tour des Merveilles'
description:
Please note prints will be delivered after 1 January 2014 

'Le tour des Merveilles' is a visual tribute to a wonderful sporting event, using the iconic periodic table as the framework. 

Information is included on every Tour de France winning rider. The race was first staged in 1903. The race was the idea of Géo Lefèvre, a journalist with L’Auto magazine. He first discussed the race with his editor at the Taverne Zimmer, a restaurant on the Boulevard de Monmartre. His editor, Henri Desgrange, famously responded, “If I understand you, petit Géo, you're proposing a Tour de France?"

The new print includes Chris Froome, the winner of the 2013 Tour de France. The new edition will celebrate the 100 wonderful years of the Tour.  I have also designed a version without Mr. Armstrong.  

Each image is a high quality giclée print, on a luxurious heavy weight Hahnemühle fine art paper. The print size of the image is available in two sizes; 30*40cm or 40*50cm.

A Limited Edition of 80 standard prints will be made of 'Le tour des Merveilles'. Each print is signed and dated by the artist.

Prints can be personalised to include an additional cell as a super fan. Please email us BEFORE you order to confirm the first name initial, a surname and a year that you wish to include in your cell (e.g. fS, Sinatra, 1966). Otherwise the lovely standard print will be sent for your pleasure.

Prints will be sent in a strong postal tube.  As each print is made individually, we aim to deliver within 5 working days. We can deliver throughout Europe, the USA and other wonderful parts of the world. Please note that the print is unframed and not mounted. And as each image is individually printed, every print is unique. Offers for my father’s trusted bicycle can be made via my website!

name: Formula 1 - the legends of the Grand Prix
description:
Please note prints will be delivered after 1 January 2014 

The ‘legends of the Grand Prix’ is a visual tribute to a wonderful motor racing series  using the iconic periodic table as the framework. The table includes details of every Formula 1 winner since 1950, with details of the winning driver and the number of wins in the season. The print also includes the all-time records of greatest ever F1 drivers such as Senna, Schumacher. Prost. Hill and Vettel.

Each image is a high quality giclée print, on a luxurious heavy weight Hahnemühle fine art paper. The print size of the image is available in two sizes; 30*40cm or 40*50cm.

A Limited Edition of 80 standard prints will be made of ‘the legends of the Grand Prix’. Each print is signed and dated by the artist.

The print will be updated on the 1st November with this year's winner.

Prints can be personalised to include the name of your choice in an additional cell. Please email us BEFORE you order to confirm the initial of your first name, a surname and the year that you wish to include in your cell (e.g. aS, Senna, 2013). name: Cricket - England Test players
description:
Please note prints will be delivered after 1 January 2014 

The ‘Elements beyond the Wicket’ is a visual tribute to some of the great characters of the England Test team, using the iconic periodic table as the framework. Information on runs, wickets  and dismissals is included. Greats such as Ian Botham, Graham Gooch, Alec Stewart, Kevin Pietersen and Bob Willis are included.  

The print includes every player to score over 3000 runs or take over 100 wickets. New editions will be available every June and November.

The print was featured in the Guardian's   'Beautiful Games' feature looking at artists and sports.

Each image is a high quality giclée print, on a luxurious heavy weight Hahnemühle fine art paper. The print size of the image is 30*40cm or 40*50cm.

A Limited Edition of 80 standard prints will be made of ‘elements beyond the wicket’.  Each print is signed and dated by the artist.

name: Vuelta a España - viva la Vuelta a España
description:
Please note prints will be delivered after 1 January 2014 

'viva la Vuelta a España' is a visual tribute to a wonderful sporting event, using the iconic periodic table as the framework. 

Information is included on every Vuelta a España winning rider. The race was first staged in 1935. The  inaugural race took place with 50 riders. The race was instigated by Clemente López Doriga and Juan Pujol, the editor of Diaro Informaciones, to increase the newspaper's circulation. It was won by Belgium rider Gustaaf Deloor, after a fierce fight against the Spanish rider Mariano Cañardo.  

The new print includes Chris Horner, the winner of the 2013 Vuelta a España.  

Each image is a high quality giclée print, on a luxurious heavy weight Hahnemühle fine art paper. The print size of the image is available in two sizes; 30*40cm or 40*50cm.

A Limited Edition of 80 standard prints will be made of 'viva la Vuelta a España'. Each print is signed and dated by the artist.

Prints can be personalised to include an additional cell as a super fan. Please email us BEFORE you order to confirm the first name initial, a surname and a year that you wish to include in your cell (e.g. fS, Sinatra, 1966). Otherwise the lovely standard print will be sent for your pleasure.

We can deliver throughout Europe, the USA and other wonderful parts of the world. Please note that the print is unframed and not mounted. And as each image is individually printed, every print is unique.

The Gentlemen's Singles Championship print includes greats such as Fred Perry, Rod Laver, Björn Borg, Jimmy Connors, John McEnroe, Roger Federer and Andy Murray, the winner of the 2013 Final.

The Ladies' Wimbledon Singles Championship print includes greats such as Billie Jean King, Virginia Wade, Martina Navratilova, Serena Williams, Venus Williams and Marion Bartoli. The Ladies' print will be available on the 2nd December.

Each image is a high quality giclée print, on a luxurious heavy weight Hahnemühle fine art paper. The print size of the image is available in two sizes; 30*40cm or 40*50cm.

description:
Please note prints will be delivered after 1 January 2014 

The ‘Park of Dreams’  is a visual tribute to some of the great characters of Celtic Football Club, using the iconic periodic table as the framework. Information on appearances and goals is included for each player.  

Each image is a high quality giclée print, on a luxurious heavy weight Hahnemühle fine art paper. The print size of the image is 30*40cm or 40*50cm.

A Limited Edition of 80 standard prints will be made of ‘Park of Dreams’.  Each print is signed and dated by the artist.
Prints can be personalised to include the name of your choice in an additional cell. Please email us BEFORE you order to confirm the initials, name and numbers that you wish to include in your cell (e.g. jS, Stein, 99, 22). Otherwise the lovely standard print will be sent for your pleasure.

Prints will be sent in a strong postal tube.  As each print is made individually, we aim to deliver within 5 working days. We can deliver throughout Europe, the USA and other wonderful parts of the world. Please note that the print is unframed. And as each image is individually printed, every print is unique.

name: Films - the Greatest Movies of all-time
description:
Please note prints will be delivered after 1 January 2014 

A beautiful, informative and unique art print for film fans.

This is a visual tribute to some of the most greatest films of all-time, using the periodic table as the framework. Each cell includes information on the film title, the director and the year of release. For example, the cell for Brief Encounter is shown as bE, Lean, 1945.

The beautiful print includes up-to two letters to represent some wonderful art house films including Double Indemnity, Chinatown, Citizen Kane, North by Northwest and Pan’s Labyrinth.  A Limited Edition of 80 standard prints will be made of this design. 

Prints can be personalised to include a favourite film or a film with special memories. This additional cell will include two letters to represent the film, the name of the director and 2013. Please email us BEFORE you order to confirm the initials, name and numbers that you wish to include in your cell. Otherwise, the standard print will be sent for your pleasure. 

Each print is signed and dated by the artist. A 'Crib Sheet' will be included with all the film titles.

Prints will be sent  in a strong postal tube. In the UK, we use the Post Office Special Delivery service.  As each print is made individually, we aim to deliver within 5 days. We can deliver throughout Europe, the USA and other wonderful parts of the world. 

Please note that the print is unframed. And as each image is individually printed, every print is unique.

name: Films - the Greatest Romantic Movies of all-time
description:
Please note prints will be delivered after 1 January 2014 

A beautiful, informative and unique art print for film fans, showing some of the most romantic films of all-time.

This is a visual tribute to some of the most romantic films of all-time, using the periodic table as the framework. Each cell includes information on the film title, the director and the year of release. For example, the cell for Brief Encounter is shown as bE, Lean, 1945.

The beautiful print includes upto two letters to represent some wonderful films includes Casablanca, Gone with the Wind, From Here to Eternity, Breakfast at Tiffany's, Ghost, Titanic, Moulin Rouge and Les Miserables. These films have introduced us to some of the most memorable characters in cinematic history, from Scarlett O'Hara and Rhett Butler to Jack Dawson and Rose DeWitt Bukater.

This is a wonderful present for any film fan and a special gift. A Limited Edition of 80 standard prints will be made of this design.

Prints can be personalised to include a favourite film or a film with special memories. 

This additional cell will include upto two letters to represent the film, the name of the director and 2013. Please email us BEFORE you order to confirm the initials, name and numbers that you wish to include in your cell. Otherwise, the standard print will be sent for your pleasure.

name: The Professor of Science 14
description:

This is visual tribute to Arsene Wenger showing every player to represent Arsenal football club in his 14 full seasons at the club. This is the First Edition of the print from 2010.

Each image is a high quality giclée print, on a luxurious heavy weight Hahnemühle fine art paper.

Print size 30*40cm.

name: Iniesta Fiesta
description:
Please note prints will be delivered after 1 January 2014 

'Iniesta Fiesa' visually records Spain’s wonderful achievement at the World Cup in 2010. A record of every game in South Africa is displayed, with a pun as well to remember each match.  

Each image is a high quality giclée print, on a luxurious heavy weight Hahnemühle fine art paper. The print is available in black or cream

Two print sizes are available - 50*50cm or 30*30cm. A Limited Edition of 60 of each type will be available.

Each  print is is signed and dated by the artist. Prints will be sent in a strong postal tube. In the UK, we use the Post Office Special Delivery service. As each print is made individually, we aim to deliver within 5 working days. We can deliver throughout Europe, the USA and other wonderful parts of the world. 

Please note that the print is unframed. And as each image is individually printed, every print is unique.

name: The Handstand Baker
description:
Please note prints will be delivered after 1 January 2014 

A beautiful and unique art print.

The ‘Handstand Baker’ print is based on a London baker from the late 1960’s. After every shift, he would unwind by completing a handstand. He was able to carry out his daily piece of specialised exercise for nearly forty years. Although his handstand days have passed, he still makes exceedingly delicious apple pies.

The standard print includes the following quote 'Take the weight off your feet'.

The image comes in two background colours - blue or purple. A Limited Edition of 80 will be made available in each colour. Each image is a high quality giclée print, on luxurious heavy weight Hahnemühle fine art paper.
 
The print size of the image is 30cm x 40cm or 40cm x 50cm.

The unframed prints will be sent in a strong postal tube.
